name: EPA_INFO_2
description: This table holds information about electronic prior authorization requests.

columns.name: REFERRAL_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the referral record.

columns.name: PREV_AUTH_EXP_DATE
columns.description: For prior authorization requests that were created because the existing authorization is about to expire, this item holds the date that the existing authorization will expire.

columns.name: ELIG_PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: This item holds the CSN of the encounter to use for pharmacy benefits for a prior authorization request.
